feed.title: Codeparity Blog - random thoughts about tech, life and anything interesting - General, Predictions, Warnings

entry.title: Let sanity prevail, i demand it.
entry.summary: This is the most important tool out there
entry.content:
bobevans @ cloudwars . co nytnews @ nytimes . com letters@washpost . com

Modern discrimination and harassment based on background of companies, allegiance - the latest corporate low of O Vs G saga.

...new motto should be "Hire evil, and then try to not be evil".

In todays' world, people would be very interested to know about C4M.
